home.subtitle: A collection of mini-games for year-end parties and team events. Guess cities, movies, songs, memes, and more—perfect for team fun!
home.clearDataMessage: Are you sure? This will clear game stats, achievements and all progress. This cannot be undone!

city.title: City Guess
city.description: A random city is chosen. After each guess you see distance, direction and city hints.

hero.title: Hero Guess
hero.description: A random hero is chosen. Use hints like role, era, nationality, and gender to find the answer.

movie.title: Movie Guess
movie.description: A random movie is chosen. Listen to a 15-second audio clip to find the answer.

visual.title: Visual Guess
visual.description: A random item is chosen (everyday objects, logos, flags, album covers). Click grid cells to reveal regions and guess.

listenSong.title: Listen Song by AI
listenSong.description: A random AI-generated song is played. Guess to find the answer. Reveal shows lyrics and artist.

imageMeme.title: Image Meme Guess
imageMeme.description: Guess the answer from an image. One image, one answer; play again after a correct guess.

settings.title: Game settings
settings.subtitle: Manage game parameters and data
settings.partyDesc: Data expiry, rewards/penalties, and draw list
settings.expiredMessage: Custom data for {games} has expired and was reset to default.
settings.listenSongPageDesc: Configure game parameters and song data
settings.imageMemePageDesc: Configure questions (image + answer). No hint switch.
settings.partyPageDesc: Data expiry, rewards/penalties and draw list
settings.expirationHint: 1–365 days. Custom data not modified within this period will be cleared.
settings.rewardsPunishmentsHint: Configure at least 3 items for draw. Green = reward, red = penalty.
settings.peopleListHint: Configure at least 3 people for draw. Add, edit, delete supported.
settings.initialHintDesc: Whether to show a category/range hint at game start (text below)

game.noMatchCity: City not in game range. Enter a major city (e.g. provincial capital).
game.playAgainMessage: End current game and start a new one?
game.clearGameDataMessage: Clear current game data and restart?
game.noVideoMessage: This movie has no video configured. Configure a local file in settings or add a valid video URL.
game.listenSongNoDataMessage: Add at least one song in settings to start.
game.listenSongNotSupported: Speech synthesis not supported in this browser
game.noMoviesMessage: Add at least one movie in settings to start.
game.imageMemeDescPrefix: Guess the answer from the image. Enter and submit.

perfect_guess.name: One shot
perfect_guess.description: Guess correctly on the first try

config.limitAttemptsDesc: When off: unlimited attempts. When on: set max attempts (default 5).
config.attemptsDesc: When limit is on, maximum attempts per game
config.initialHintDesc: Show an initial hint at game start
config.avoidRepeatTitle: Avoid repeated questions in one session
config.avoidRepeatDesc: When on, questions won't repeat within one play session until the pool is exhausted.

party.configInsufficientPeople: Configure at least 3 people in settings first.
party.configInsufficientRewards: Configure at least 3 rewards in settings first.
party.configInsufficientPunishments: Configure at least 3 penalties in settings first.
